channel.title: Software on nuaNce's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Software on nuaNce's blog

item.title: Some of My Favorite Software
item.description: Just a list of some software I find nice to use: Software Description dash Fast and powerful POSIX shell giph Customizable and easy to use GIF recorder maim Extremely powerful CLI screenshot tool mpv Simple yet featureful CLI media player SXIV “Simple X Image Viewer” birch Freenode IRC client written in bash herbe Simple, yet DBus free notifications farge Simple Colorpicker written in bash ungoogled-chromium Browse safely and Google-free, no compromises ST Simple Terminal scr Super Crappy SCReenshot SCRipt for Sound Cloud Rappers vimtex Make LaTeX in Vim a breeze to edit shfm Terminal file browser written in posix shell KISS Linux An independent Linux Distro focused on simplicity cchat-gtk GTK+ frontend for cchat cfm Simple and fast terminal file manager ORW Extremely extensible Openbox Ricing Wrapper epy Terminal based Ebook reader PDF Viewer Plus The best mobile PDF viewer there is doas Simple and light sudo replacement wpm Command line typing test monkey-type Clean, fun, and minimal typing test wmutils Very extensible set of WM utilities
